ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Stupid Names (was Gnome Kabobs) (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, like many people, I have taken refuge in other things: #1) Other characters, so I can play with my RL friends.  Right now, I have a Cleric, and I m
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:52 AM 3/13/00 -0600, you wrote:
>PS: I'm glad you're still playing Talies.

Well, like many people, I have taken refuge in other things:
#1) Other characters, so I can play with my RL friends. Right now, I have
a Cleric, and I'm enjoying the heck out of it. When I get bored of combat,
I just sit back and heal everybody that comes my way. Makes me feel
useful. Last night, I saved the same guy 4 times, and in the process
gained half a bubble because I managed to get the kills on some blues he
was tanking. heh - And I was trying NOT to gain experience ;)

#2) Asheron's Call. I agree - I like it for the soloing, but I am also
disappointed by the models and lack of creature variety. The creatures
aren't as vibrant, but the world looks nicer. And I like the fact that I
can solo. Really.

#3) A girlfriend. 'nuff said.

Talies the Wanderer
